thread.title: Dollar Slumped Against Euro, Yen in August
thread.title_full: Dollar Slumped Against Euro, Yen in August - WSJ

author: James Ramage
title: Dollar Slumped Against Euro, Yen in August
text:
The dollar retreated against the euro and the yen in August as rising concerns over global growth and inflation moved investors to push back expectations for higher U.S. interest rates and exit from some of their large consensus trades.
Investors began shedding some of their long-dollar bets against the euro and the yen after China devalued its currency on Aug. 11 and later reported soft economic data, both of which signaled that its economy might be slowing more than thought.
